imageEditor.selectedImages: Selected {count} image{plural} for combination editing (order: {order}). Click images to deselect.

imageEditor.uploadToStart: Upload images to start editing - they will be auto-selected for you
imageEditor.combinePrompt: How would you like to combine and edit these images?
imageEditor.editPrompt: What changes would you like to make?
imageEditor.createPrompt: Describe the image you want to create
imageEditor.placeholderCombine: E.g. Combine the first and second image, merge them into a single scene, put the person from image 1 into the background of image 2
imageEditor.placeholderEdit: E.g. Change the background to a sunset beach scene, add more colorful flowers
imageEditor.placeholderCreate: E.g. A beautiful landscape with mountains and a lake at sunset
